body.name: Minimalist 3% Sepicalm Face Moisturizer for Sensitive & Acne Prone Skin | Soothes Redness & Irritated Skin | For Women & Men | 1.7 Oz / 50 gm
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 42 mins
features: [ LIGHTWEIGHT MOISTURIZER WITH SHEA BUTTER ]: Formulated with Sensitive & Acne Prone Skin in mind, this moisturizer is super light weight, absorbs quickly and does not feels sticky or oily on face. It has a perfect blend of Humectant, Emollient and Occlusive. It contains Shea Butter which is an excellent occlusive and locks the moisture inside our skin.

[ ULTRA HYDRATING | PGA HOLDS 4x MORE WATER THAN HYALURONIC ACID ]: Made with Polyglutamic Acid for skin hydration. It's a new generation hydration molecule which can hold 4 times more water than Hyaluronic Acid and reduces transepidermal water loss as well at the same time

[ SOOTHING & CALMING ]: Boosted with Sepicalm which combines Amino Acids with Minerals to soothe irritations and calms redness caused by UVA / UVB and comforts skin. Also contains Oat extract, Colloidal Oat, Squalane, Vitamin B5 and Amino acid to further nourish & calm skin.

[ CLEAN & TRANSPARENT BEAUTY ]: This moisturizer is (i) Fragrance-free (ii) Silicones-free (iii) Sulfates-free (iv) Parabens-free (v) Essential Oils-free and (vi) Dyes-free. Also, it is non-comedogenic and hypoallergenic. Formulated at pH 5.0 - 6.0 with high quality ingredients including Sepicalm sourced from Seppic, France and Squalane sourced from Sophim, France
[ FOR SENSITIVE, ACNE PRONE & IRRITATED SKIN TYPES ]: Use after cleansing, toning and applying all serums. When to use: AM & PM. Everyday.
body.description: A lightweight moisturizer that hydrates, soothes, and softens skin, without oily, shiny or heavy residual feel. Perfect blend of hydrators, emollients and occlusives for all day moisturization. Suitable for Normal, Acne-Prone & Sensitive Skin.

reviews.reviewText: W O W 😍 a moisturizer with an ingredient that can potentially cause endocrine disruption, AND… have a toxic affect on blood and liver?😩😍No babes.Save your money. There’s so many other products out there that dont lie about being clean & you get more for your buck!Do you sue deligigence on researching the ingredients instead of trusting the advertising a company is trying to sell :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Should have read reviews
reviews.reviewText: This broke me out almost immediately. Granted, I do generally struggle with acne but I've heard great things about this company. It also didn't irritate when I used, even on my hands.

This minimalist moisturizer is great in quality ,great ingredientsand affordable as well.this is the only moisturizer I find to be unscented or fragrance at this price point because fragrance free products are usually pricey and we should really avoid fragrance.Now talking aboutTexture- it is like in thick consistency apparently but when we apply it gets absorbed very quickly.does not feel like heavy which is great.Summar time- great for oily, acne-prone skin, sensitive skin.but.......Winter time- no, it is not a winter time moisturizer.it is not quite moisturizing.even someone who has oily skin but feels very dry in winter then no it is not for you.Bonus :it has a cooling sensation which calms down the angry skin a bit.so sensitive skin people don't worry buy it..worth the money

First thing first, many people complained about the moisturizer balling up while application. We need to realise two things. This product does not contain any silicone and contains oat extract. Naturally, the application is going to be a tad bit difficult. But let's accept the fact we love Minimalist because they don't use silicone, paraben, essential oil and other harsh ingredients.The solution to easy application is take a very small amount. Now apply over by moving in short strokes either moving upward or downward. Now again take very small amount and apply by stroking in opposite direction. Now massage gently in circles. That's it.It gives a bit of irritation which lasted for few minutes.I have combination skin type.This could last somewhere around two months if you use regularly twice in a day.Skin doesn't stay hydrated longer. Needs application every 4-5 hours. Its gonna be a huge problem if you use sunscreen regularly.The main problem with this product is sweating post application.This won't suit for most people for use during daytime. Perfect for night time use.Final verdict: Not the worst. Nor the best. If you bought it, use it at night time. For daytime use, skip this.Thanks for reading.Update : I hated this moisturizer as much as everybody does due to the difficulty with application and shorter span of hydration. But recently I found some good techniques. If you use rosehip oil or retinol serum with squalane base or just squalane oil alone, you cannot apply the oil on moist face as the oil and water are immiscible and while application, oil will push out the water from the skin.My suggestion is, apply your retinol serum or rosehip oil on dry skin. Wait for 30 minutes while the oil enters deep in to the skin. Now apply this moisturizer on top of the oil. The application is super smooth. No balling up. Superb and longer moisturization. Better than many sleeping mask. And your skin doesn't look dull too.Use the same technique during day time too. Instead of retinol/rosehip oil serum, use plain squalane oil.

reviews.reviewTitle: One of the best moisturisers in market for a reasonable price
reviews.reviewText: Love the products from minimalist as they are formulated without fragrance, dye and unnecessary harmful chemicals. This moisturiser is really cooling on the skin and moisturises well as it has enough humectants and emollients. Oats is also very good and soothing for the skin and so is sepicalm. My only issue is it can make my skin feel oily if I apply it during the day but it works well for a night moisturiser. It also helps repair skin from any sort of damage or dryness. It is very well made, it’s one of the best moisturisers available in Indian market right now and at this reasonable price. Must try

Okay guys n girls. I have a very oily Tzone and kind of dry cheeks. (Combination skin) I read reviews of this cream on every available platform and I was running out of my moisturizer. I love their Vitamin C serum and wanted to try something else from them. So even though a lot of reviews said it's not for oily skin, but the brand says it is, I took it at face value n bought it.So here's my review:I will probably take a year to finish this 😭😂As I opened the jar I thought such less quantity! Then I applied it on my hand and it has a great spread. You need verrrry little to cover your whole face.Now the consistency is deceptively light and gel like, you can't tell what it's like from reviews! It looks light and moisturizing on video! But once you put it on. Oh man 😂 it's too thick for me. And I'm pretty sure for most oily skin gals like me. I used too much the first time (normal moisturizer amt) and had to spread it all the way to my neck, chest! It spreads like a thick lotion, that takes time to seep into your skin. You'll probably need to work it in for a few seconds. Then it immediately made me sweat -_- upper lip, forehead, under lips, basically everywhere I applied it on my face.So the take away is. Don't be foolish like me and buy it for Oily skin 😂 I'll probably use it on my body !If you have oily skin and really want to try it out, use it in winters, not in Humid weather, like I did!Or this will be a beautiful moisturizer for Dry skin!!Hope this helps.
This is my 3rd tube, it is good as cetaphil and better than cetaphil moisturizer. But it is costly with less quantity. Seller should drop It's price, continue increasing.
